instructions: Download and launch the Yahoo Mail app Sign in to your Yahoo email account. Tap the Menu icon on the top left corner. Tap the Key icon next to your email address. Tap the Set up Account Key button. Tap the green checkmark on the Sample Account Key screen. Tap the Got it button Confirm your mobile number by tapping the Enable Yahoo Account Key button. If the mobile number that shows up is not your, please tap the Update my phone number and enter the correct information. You have successfully set up your Yahoo Account Key, tap the Great, got it! button to go back to your Yahoo Mail app.
